title: [LFM] [OCE] Oceanic Ranked Team - Dedicated & Competitive [Skype / TS required]
body:
**Team Name** : To Be decided (Plague Knights currently)
**Team Captain** : Kongor (Myself)
**Game Time** : +10:00 AEST - (8:00PM to 10:00PM) - Day to be decided (Practice - Pre-6:00PM) 3v3 or Duo - Casual.  
**Rank Required** : Silver 5 or higher 
**Attitude Required** : Willing to learn, Listens to instructions / advice, dedication to team play & enjoyment of the competitive scene.
**Positions Open **: ADC, TOP and MID
**Champion Proficiency **: 3 or more. 

This is a brand new OCE team hoping to climb the ranked 5v5 ladder with casual Duo & 3v3 play during the week. 

We are currently 2; A support main with off position as ADC & TOP, and a Jungle Main with off-position as TOP. We are looking for 3 additional players; a dedicated MID, TOP and ADC who has the desire to learn, function as a team, willingness to listen to instructions if given and if not the best, willingness and dedication to improve fundamentals of their role. It would be preferable if the team would be willing to discuss team composition, match-ups, play styles and overall gameplay after a match.

As serious as all the above is, we do wish to have fun while we're playing. We are open to anyone ~~who isn't bad~~ with the above attitudes and hopefully, as a team, grow and progressively win more and more games (if we don't to begin with). We do have the dream of eventually becoming a competitive scene team that can participate in tournaments, even if they are only small ones. Play days are open to discussion (We aren't slave drivers) but we would like to regularly schedule Un-ranked Practice games on most days and are aiming for one ranked team game on set days (At least 3-4 / week). 

_**Current Composition** : _
1. [TOP] - Available
2. [MID] - _Heywood Jablowme_
3. [JGE] - _Kongor_
4. [SUP] -_ LiquoriceSpud_
5. [ADC] - _A Blue Quaker_

**Contact Information :**

We use Skype and Teamspeak depending on player's preferance
To contact us regarding applications, message in-game or email either of the below.
Or just leave a comment. That's cool too :D

* **Captain**
IGN  : Kongor 
Email : TBKGrey@gmail.com
Skype :- On Request

* **Vice Captain**
IGN :- LiquoriceSpud
Email :- Unavailable
Skype :- On request

replies.body:
Hey Kongor,
Currently I am a Gold 2 Mid Lane main, I play Syndra, Ahri and Zyra to a high proficiency and I can use teamspeak/skype. I am also available to play almost every day after around 6pm.
I am willing to learn more picks and am currently picking up the Azir.
My IGN: Celestite

Hi,
Gold 3 Mid Lane Main, can play all mid lane champs at a "decent lvl" , mains are azir, yas, fizz 
IGN: Drypanties
Can play most days after 5pm and weekends

Hey mate Im a plat player looking for a serious team. I am currently a mid lane player and i feel as though i am very reliable and willing to climb to the best of my ability. happy to offer you what i can to help you guys climb as a team and constructively{{champion:81}} .

IGN: pink blits

i play top alot im boucning around silver aiming for g5 this season can also play azir mid have around 180k points in him

what i can offer is someone who is willing to learn play styles and to work as a team and who wants to make it somewhere

 champ pool: gnar,maokai,shen,rumble,lissandra,fiora 
have a few others that im learning on aswell and willing to learn other power team picks like lulu all i ask if give me a try who knows i might surprise you or with your help you could mold me into a new role

"We are not above using teamspeak" ??

TeamSpeak is infinitely better than skype for gaming and that's an object fact.

It's sole selling point is that it uses minimal resources on your computer, and uses a minimal amount of bandwidth.

Well we've, Spud and I, have been chatting over Skype for years. Its what we're used to hence the wording on the post.
If what people, on majority use, then we will totally use Teamspeak. I didn't know that it used less bandwidth :/
Thanks for your imput man. I'll just edit the post a bit.

Feel free to add me or my smurf (DarkSoul1994) if you can't find an AD Carry.

I really don't mind whether people are Bronze or Challenger when I play in teams as long as they use comms like you guys.
